post:
I have a 64MB LA Server with Cloudshards that I can't seem to use any more.

Specifications:

<code>64MB RAM
32MB vSWAP
1 CPU
5GB HDD
200GB B/W @ 1gbit
IPv6 - 16 
IPv4 - 1
$7.5/yr
Asia Optimized Routes</code>

Reply with what you would use it for and I'll decide who receives it the next time I come back to it.
